changelog.summary: Product sense is now an integrated, first-class part of the repo: the agent orchestrates three modes (product_sense_mode, execution_mode, meta_mode), enforces braindump-before-structure, and uses a two-level evaluation system plus "For Agents" sections in 14 frameworks to guide user thinking and artifact quality end-to-end.
Initial version with complete framework library (14 frameworks), agent instructions (AGENTS.md), eval system (Level 1 & Level 2), 6 rules, 1 skill, and architecture documentation
